quotes.quote: New love may soar and plummet as it ebbs and flows, but what remains are the things we've discovered about each other. I'd do it all again because it led us to this love we share today.
You have to walk carefully in the beginning of love; the running across fields into your lover's arms can only come later when you're sure they won't laugh if you trip.
I have learned not to worry about love; But to honor its coming with all my heart.
The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.
Love at first sight has nothing on how special love at first talk is. I've cherished all our getting-to-know-you moments we've shared. May they go on and on!
The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.

When you grow older, you love again, and the new love feels so different that the love before feels like make-believe. The way you love changes throughout your life. Even the way you love the same person changes.
Getting into a new relationship is like pouring Miracle-Gro on your character defects.
It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
The best part about getting to know you is anticipating that each day brings new surprises that are all about you.
For every new relationship, there's at least another new broken heart.
I present myself to you in a form suitable to the relationship I wish to achieve with you.
When a man loves a woman, periodically he needs to pull away before he can get closer.
I knew you were special from the moment we met. How I'm looking forward to all of our tomorrows.
One genuine new relationship is worth a fistful of business cards.
New love is grand. Savor all the crazy, muddled might of it.
It does not need that a poem should be long. Every word was once a poem. Every new relationship is a new word.
Don't ever punish your present relationship for what your past relationship did.
Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship's poison.
New love can heal lost loves, but it cannot make you forget.
Don't let your past relationships ruin your future relationships because everyone is not the same and true love might not always be what you want, so accept who God blesses you with.
Since I met you, I started to understand why all my past relationships ended: so that we could start.
If a relationship is founded on love it doesn't end.
When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
New month, new intentions, new goals, new love, new light, and new beginnings.
To create is not to deform or invent persons and things. It is to tie new relationships between persons and things which are, and as they are.
We have to bring children into a new relationship to food that connects them to culture and agriculture.
Love must be learned, and learned again and again; there is no end to it.
